text: He imandarasakala! Pandita arau sansara-biraagisakalara majata bahute'i janasadharanara dhana-sampada an'yayabharae bhaksana karae arau manuhaka allahara pathara paraa nibrtta karae. Arau yisakale sona-raupa sancaya karae arau seya allahara pathata byaya nakarae tumi sihamtaka yantranadayaka sastira susambada diya
